message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of scheduling data transmissions from power-constrained sensors in the industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) network, with the goal of minimizing the Age of Information (AoI). The paper proposes a scheduling algorithm that takes into account the Markov time-varying channel states and the bandwidth constraint. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.MA (Multiagent Systems), and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
